page.title: 09School Games
page.content: Many games are played in our school yard.The games vary according to the time of year.Energetic games are played during the cold months and less energetic ones during the summer. Most children (97%) played with other children. The most popular game with the boys is football which is played all the year round,67% of boys play it. Cricket and ball tag, 8% each,are also played.Most of the boys' games involve a ball. Rounders 42% and skipping 36% are the most popular girls'games. Several different Skipping rhymes are used.Two other games are 'Fireball'12% and 'Queenies got the ball'8%. Several boys join in the game of rounders.
